Html:
Hello Everyone,

Don't know if anyone noticed it, but I sent a new issue with code relating to how implement the shrinkToFit alignment option in cells. Works for both XLSX and BIFF8 files.

Hopefully it will be helpfull for other people around here.

Issue is this one:

http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=7182

Cya.
I think that the team members will take a look at it when they are back from vacation :)
